translation_info.title: KAKAIYARI NIUKIEYA XAPAYARI WIXARIKAKI
translation_info.license: Creative Commons License: Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

verses.text: Ne nemi'a'ukiyari, nepimati'utiirie nemimatsinaki'erie Kayu, yuriki nepimatsinaki'erie. [cite: 7, 8, 9, 10]
Neuxei, 'eki nemimatsinaki'erie, nepinenenewie naimeki 'aixia pemireumieniki meta 'aixia pemireu'eriekaki, 'a'iyari 'aixia mitimie hepai. [cite: 11]
Waikawa nepinetemawiekai me'u'axiaku ta'iwama meta metehekiatakaku 'ahepaitsita yuri kepemaine, yaxeikia 'eki tita yuri mirainetsie yapetiyurieneti pemuyeikaki. [cite: 12]
Keyanemikatinetemawie, waikawa matsi nepinetemawie yanetimaiti kename neniwema hipati me'u'uwa tita yuri mirainetsie metewiyati. [cite: 13]
Neuxei, 'eki nemimatsinaki'erie, yamitikamie hepai pekaniyianeni naime ta'iwama wahetsiemieme kepemitiyuriene, pemikawamate. [cite: 14, 15]
Miki mekateniutahekiata meyukuxeirieku kepemiti'akanaki'erie. 'Aixia pekaniwayuriemiki pewaparewieti wahuyeta, Kakaiyari kemitinake petiuka'iyariti. [cite: 17]
Kemi'ane Ketsutsi Kiritsitu mihikitsie mieme meteta'uximayatake mekanayekine, tixaiti mepikatewarutanaki'eriri hipame nuiwarite. [cite: 21]
'Ayumieme kaneuyeweka tame temiwatanaki'erieniki miyamemi'anene takie miki meta tanaiti tita yuri mirainetsie mieme temite'uximayakaki. [cite: 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28]
Ne 'etsiwa nepitiwaruta'utiiri memiyutixexeiriwa, peru miki Riyutirepexi manuyehaitia mayuyeitiamiki pikatatsi'upitia. [cite: 29, 30, 31]

'Ayumieme xika nehenuani nekan- eye'eritiamiki kemitiyuriene niuki 'axami'aneneki tatsiniukimati. Mikiki xeikia pikanaki'a, matsi miireme pitiyurienikeyu. Ta'iwama pikawapitia, pikawataunie miki memiwapitiaku, memiyutixexeiriwa watsata piwaranuyeni'awa. [cite: 32, 33]

Neuxei, 'eki nemimatsinaki'erie, 'axamiti'ane pepika'ikeni, 'aixia miti'ane pita kene'ikeni. Kemi'ane 'aixia mitiyuriene Kakaiyari hetsia kanimiemetini, kemi'ane 'axamitiyuriene Kakaiyari pikaxeiyawe. [cite: 34, 35]
Yunaiti mepitehekiata Remetiriyu hepaitsita meta tita yuri miraine pitiutahekiataxi hepaitsitana. Tameta tepitehekiata hepaitsitana 'eki pepitimate ketemitehekiata muyuriki. [cite: 36]
Netsi waikawa nepimatitaxatianikeyu, nepikanewairiya peru nemimeraka'utiirieniki. [cite: 37, 38, 39, 40]
Nepimatsixeiyamikikaku pita xapatsie kwitiwa, pepika'uximatiarieka. tahixie te'utineniereti tepitetaxata. [cite: 42, 43, 44, 45, 46]
'A'iyaritsie 'Ahamikuma 'ena mepimetsiwairitia. 'Ekita muwa paiti keniwarewairitiaka yuxexuime miki temiwanaki'erie. [cite: 47, 48, 52]
